text:
Mr* Sam Becker
January 8, 1958
Page Two
As I clear the files here, there may be further items to forward to
you. As you already know, grants-in-aid applications have been coming
in here. These have been airmailed to Harry and should reach him to¬
day, Wednesday, or certainly by Thursday morning. I assume that these
will be sent right out to you. If further properly dated applications
do come in 1*11 telephone you by Friday afternoon to hold up the re¬
mailing of the others to committee members.
This looks like a really challenging year ahead of usj Pm looking
forward to working with you.
Cordially,
Raymond D. Cheydleur
Assistant Director
RDCjas
C.C. Harry Skornia
Burton Paulu
Airmail
